item.title: Officiating the funeral
item.description: I don’t enjoy officiating at funerals, especially of someone I’ve loved. Sometimes, though, Fate…

item.title: Deep Dive: Articles on contemplative practices and near death experiences
item.description: This week we consider recent research on mindfulness showing distinct patterns of contemplative practive help well-being. We also look at an article on the death experience during CPR. Maybe we shouldn’t blow off those near-death experiences so quickly.
